name: HakkoAI
tagline: Your best friend and advisor in PC games
description: Stuck on a frustrating boss in PC games? Or lost in a maze-like puzzle? Don't alt-tab for guides! With HakkoAI, just ask aloud. Your AI gaming advisor delivers the perfect tip via real-time voice chat, right when you need it.

name: Next.js 16
tagline: The React Framework for the Web
description: Next.js 16 includes Cache Components, stable Turbopack, file system caching, React Compiler support, smarter routing, new caching APIs, and React 19.2 features.

name: Google Skills
tagline: Build AI skills for tomorrow, today
description: Learn and earn with Google Skills, a platform that provides free training and certifications for Google Cloud partners and beginners. Explore now.

name: Tailkits UI
tagline: 200 tailwind CSS components
description: Tailkits UI offers a library of over 200 customizable Tailwind components designed to streamline your web development process. These components are perfect for creating modern, responsive websites and landing pages.

name: Reflex
tagline: Prompt to production app, in Pure Python
description: Reflex is an AI app builder that lets you create production-ready web apps entirely in Python, powered by its own open-source framework. Just connect your data and enter a prompt—it builds full-stack apps that work with any data source, API, or Python package.

name: Tiny A/B Test
tagline: Lightweight a/b testing for saas founders
description: Test what converts in seconds. Stupid simple A/B testing for landing pages. <5KB script, real-time results, country segmentation. Start testing in minutes, not days or weeks.

name: Gelt.dev
tagline: AI agents build, run, & deploy your next full-stack app
description: With Gelt, you can prompt, run, and deploy full-stack web apps in minutes - no setup or coding needed. Fully Agent-powered, production-ready, and up to 40% cheaper than competitors. Pay per message, integrate Stripe and more in one click, and deploy instantly.

name: Notilus
tagline: A super simple note app inspired by Apple Notes
description: Write instantly like a simple note app and organize by category. Notilus removes distractions so you can focus on ideas and capture every moment of inspiration.

name: Grain
tagline: Map user journeys in real time and tune with remote config
description: Spot drop-offs, understand paths, and change configs on the fly—no deploys. Real-time journey analytics for the web. Privacy-ready (GDPR/CCPA). Try the live demo and add the SDK in 5 minutes.

name: Peek-a-Doodle for iOS & iPadOS
tagline: Send doodles that pop up on your friends’ home screen
description: Draw it. Send it. Watch them smile. 💫 Peek-A-Doodle turns your doodles into Home Screen surprises for friends, couples and long-distance love. ❤️

name: DoDot
tagline: Daily prompt-based social media
description: DoDot is a daily, prompt-based social app that redefines meaningful check-ins with a fun twist. One question for everyone to answer together, discover more about each other, and build a simple habit of connection that’s synchronous, low-pressure, and fun.

name: Voicetypr
tagline: Speech to text for writing thoughts faster & privately
description: AI powered offline voice to text app for founders & AI builders. Build 3x faster with your voice. High accuracy, Blazing fast on your device. One-time purchase, no subscription. Available on macOS and Windows

name: HabitForge
tagline: Build lasting habits with friends & real accountability
description: Build lasting habits with friends through social accountability, real-world consequences, and gamification. Join a Forge with friends, set goals together, and track progress with daily check-ins, streaks, and achievements. Make habit-building fun & sustainable

name: Socialwiz Ad Analyzer
tagline: Checks Your Ad Before You Hit Publish.
description: Analyze your ad creatives with AI. Get instant insights on visuals, hooks, copy, and audience fit to boost performance. Try the SocialWiz Ad Analyzer for FREE now.

name: TalkFlow
tagline: Speak English Naturally with Human-Like AI Tutors.
description: TalkFlow helps learners practice English with human-like AI tutors, real-world scenarios, and instant feedback on pronunciation, grammar, and fluency. Build confidence anytime, anywhere with safe, smart, and personalized speaking practice.

name: Unblur Image
tagline: Instantly unblur and upscale images with AI.
description: Enhance any blurry photo instantly with AI. Unblur images, restore details, and upscale resolution by 2×–4× directly in Chrome. Supports JPG, PNG, WEBP - perfect for photos, scans, and low-res visuals.

name: StickrSnap
tagline: AI Sticker Maker & Remixer
description: StickrSnap turns your photos into amazing stickers with AI: background removal, 8 artistic styles, live previews, and a token-based model. Free to try with 3 free stickers! If you like the app, let me know and I'll provide a promocode for a free Creator Pack

name: Clocks Dash
tagline: A visual board of your remote team’s times
description: A visual dashboard of your remote team’s local times.

name: Smartfin
tagline: The stock analysis platform you'll actually enjoy using
description: Smartfin is the Stock Analysis Platform for Everyday Investors. Track, score, and explore stocks with ease. Try Smartfin today for real-time alerts, powerful financial data, and beautiful visuals.

name: Combine PDF
tagline: Merge pdf files instantly — private & offline
description: Need to merge PDF files? Combine them in seconds — fully offline, no sign-up, no data sharing. Just you and your documents.
